attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is time for all A and B class roads to have the potholes cracks and loose tarmac repaired, our roads are a danger to all road users. They Will cause fatal accidents, there is a duty of care here,time to make our roads safe for all.

rejection.details:
There are a couple of petitions already on this issue
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=pot+hole
Please consider signing an existing petition, rather than creating another.

If you do decide to resubmit then the title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
